titles.title: Acres Of Diamonds, Mountains Of Gold

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Acres of diamonds, mountains of gold,
Rivers of silver, treasures untold,
All put together couldn't buy you and me
A heart that's contented, or a spirit that's free.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Peace when you're troubled, a satisfied mind,
These are the treasures that money can't buy.
